metadata.titel_preek: Mt. Nebo: The Mount Of Mystery

kernfrasen: starts his climb up Nebo's side
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A JOURNEY TOWARD A DIVINE DESTINATION

kernfrasen: spot of mud on a white and laundered cloth
unworthy of so smart a generation

dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: EXISTENCE IS A LIGHTED ROOM BETWEEN DARKNESSES

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: It is fatal like leprosy, if unchecked.

cognitieve_implicaties: The sinner is a victim of a condition
ethische_implicaties: Urgency in 'checking' behavior before it spreads
onbedoelde_consequenties: Reduces moral agency (one doesn't choose leprosy)

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: While leprosy is a biblical trope for sin, the preacher revitalizes it by linking it to a modern murder case in San Francisco.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: God rocked his servant to sleep, God dug his grave in a cleft, angels were his pallbearers.

cognitieve_implicaties: Death is not an end but a transition to safety
God is intimately involved in the physical end of life
theologische_implicaties: The sovereignty of God over the 'unknown'
ethische_implicaties: Fearlessness in the face of mortality

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher uses highly poetic, specific imagery (pallbearers, rocking) to turn the 'dead' concept of 'going to heaven' into a vivid scene.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon maintains a strong vertical and linear coherence. Life is a journey (horizontal) toward a mountain (vertical) where the mystery of God resides. The tension between God as 'Severe Judge' (Meribah) and 'Gentle Parent' (Nebo) is held together by the overarching theme of 'Mystery'.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: God bars Moses for a 'trivial offense' (anger), yet 'rocks him to sleep'.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: A judge demands satisfaction; a parent offers comfort regardless of the 'mud on the garment'.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Journey' on earth ends at a 'Height' (Nebo) which becomes a launchpad for 'Flight' (Ascension) to a 'Home' (Final Destination).

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the abstract concept of 'Mystery' and gives it physical weight through the imagery of the swallow in the banquet hall.
sterktes.voorbeeld: we are like swallows that enter a room beyond whose threshold there is darkness

risicos.beschrijving: Describing God 'digging a grave' and 'rocking to sleep' can lead to a highly anthropomorphic view of God that clashes with the 'Mystery' the preacher seeks to uphold.
risicos.voorbeeld: God rocked his servant to sleep, God dug his grave
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as a physical entity rather than a transcendent mystery.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The ascent of Mt. Nebo (The rugged, lonely climb).
sub_worlds: The Anglo-Saxon Banquet Hall (The Swallow story)
The San Francisco Jail Cell (The murder story)
The Burning Old Church Building (The local history)

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective; uses 'I watch him' to pull the hearer into the biblical scene as an eyewitness.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Emphasizing the 'old warrior' and 'laboring so long'.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Critiquing the 'smart generation' that uses Latin names to explain away awe.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits a 'Service of the Word' or Funeral context, moving from lament to hope.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the JOURNEY and VERTICALITY domains. It successfully moves from the 'darkness' of the unknown to the 'heights' of divine presence. However, it relies heavily on 19th-century Romantic imagery (Browning, 'sweet mystery') which may feel 'dead' to a postmodern audience.

revitalisatie_suggesties.doel_metafoor: SIN IS A SPOT OF MUD
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Use the 'leprosy' or 'jail cell' imagery more consistently to show the systemic nature of sin rather than just a 'spot' on a garment.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Sin is the invisible radiation that sickens the soul before the symptoms appear.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The 'Severe Judge' vs 'Gentle Parent' tension regarding Moses' sin.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Frame the denial of entry not as 'punishment' but as 'completion'â€”the warrior is tired and the Parent says 'enough'.

entailment_checks.metafoor: LIFE IS A ROOM BETWEEN DARKNESS
entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests we come from 'darkness' (nothingness) rather than from God.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that the 'darkness' is only from our perspective, not God's.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: The preacher mentions 'particles' and 'ten billion years'; expanding this would resonate with the 'smart generation' he addresses.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using the 'Journey' and 'Verticality' schemas to provide pastoral comfort in the face of death.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: An aesthetic analysis would praise the 'swallow' imagery for its beauty; CMT reveals it functions as a CONTAINER schema for human existence.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Kolb would focus on the 'experience' of the listener; CMT focuses on the 'cognitive mapping' that makes the experience possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher uses 'Mystery' as a container that holds conflicting metaphors (Judge/Parent) together without logical collapse.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: thrown the baby out with the bathwater
appendices.notities: The preacher uses 'Mystery' as a meta-metaphor to bypass logical objections to theodicy.
